name: ReplayWell
tag_list: video, speech, speech-to-text, slides, slide-synchronization, slide-to-text, search, event, conference, presentation
overview:
All knowledge on one place, visible and searchable.

ReplayWell runs SuperLectures.com service that covers conference/event video processing. It takes care of the whole data process from video editing, captioning, slide synchronization, video hosting, traffic analytics, to marketing and presentation to users.

In short, at SuperLectures.com, we:

  • convert audio and slides into the text - so the conference is visible to Google.
  • do the dirty job (video editing, web presentation building).
  • promote sponsors.
  • measure which video parts are watched most.
  • link to speakers’ websites, blogs, twitters, etc.

The most common scenario:

1) The conference/event organizer gives us all data captured at the event in a raw form - video recordings, slides, abstracts, etc.

2) We process the data (off-line) and within several days create a web presentation of the conference where all the data (knowledge) is on one place.

3) Users have a nice “video” player with synchronized slides, search in speech and all other information tied to the talk. They can easily embed or share the player with others.
